title: The New Support Items Are Great! At First I Thought They Were Terrible!!!
body: Ok so I love the new support items and I want to see who else does... write your thoughts below... I totally understand if you hate it. They seem to give you less farm but you just have to use them correctly.... Put reasons to like the new support items here and lets show Riot how much we are grateful for them. Also place arguments against them here... we want all the feedback to go to them bad and good. Also HAPPY THANKSGIVING... (if you celebrate it anyway lol and if you don't happy thanksgiving anyway){{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
